text: Dimo Khristov (born 12 November 1952) is a Bulgarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Bulgaria Category:Equestrians at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Dimo Khristov
